hero.title: Master Crypto Trading
hero.subtitle: Tradoxus provides a safe, practical learning environment for crypto trading education through gamified experiences. Master the markets without the risk.

features.title: Why Choose Tradoxus?
features.educationDesc: Earn rewards, complete missions, and climb the rankings as you learn. Make education engaging and motivating through interactive challenges.
features.safetyDesc: Practice trading with real-time market data without risking your actual funds. Get immediate feedback on your decisions and learn from every trade.
features.communityDesc: Track your performance, develop custom indicators, and analyze your trading strategies with professional-grade tools and detailed insights.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.

web3.title: Web3 Integration
web3.sectionSubtitle: Tradoxus leverages Web3 technologies to provide a cutting-edge learning experience that goes beyond traditional educational platforms. Our Web3 integration offers unique advantages that prepare you for the real world of crypto trading.
web3.whyWeb3Title: Why Web3 Matters in Crypto Education
web3.whyWeb3Subtitle: Integrating Web3 technologies into our educational platform provides several key benefits.

feature-1.title: Transparent Progress Tracking
feature-1.description: Your learning progress and achievements are recorded on the blockchain, ensuring transparency and immutability.

feature-2.title: Token and NFT Rewards
feature-2.description: Earn real crypto tokens and educational NFTs as you complete courses and achieve milestones.

feature-3.title: On-Chain Data Access
feature-3.description: Gain insights from real blockchain data for advanced analysis and decision-making in your trading strategies.

feature-4.title: DeFi Protocol Integration
feature-4.description: Practice with simulated integrations of real DeFi protocols to understand complex trading scenarios.

benefit-1.title: Authenticity
benefit-1.description: Learn with real-world data and scenarios.

benefit-2.title: Interoperability
benefit-2.description: Skills and credentials that can be recognized across the crypto ecosystem.

benefit-3.title: Community
benefit-3.description: Participate in a decentralized learning community governed by its members.

benefit-4.title: Ownership
benefit-4.description: True ownership of your educational achievements and rewards.

benefit-5.title: Innovation
benefit-5.description: Stay at the forefront of blockchain technology and its applications in finance.
